tool.name: astropy fitsinfo
tool.help:
Return a summary of the HDUs and their metadata (image dimensions and types, table columns, etc) in a FITS file..
---------
**Example:**
For example, here is the output for on of the sample fits files, https://fits.gsfc.nasa.gov/samples/WFPC2u5780205r_c0fx.fits
.. code-block::
No. Name Ver Type Cards Dimensions Format 0 PRIMARY 1 PrimaryHDU 262 (200, 200, 4) float32 1 u5780205r_cvt.c0h.tab 1 TableHDU 353 4R x 49C [D25.17, D25.17, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, A1, E15.7, I12, I12, D25.17, D25.17, A8, A8, I12, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, I12, I12, I12, I12, I12, I12, I12, I12, A48, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7, E15.7]
This tool represents a script which is part of the Astropy package. See `astropy help on fitsinfo <https://docs.astropy.org/en/latest/io/fits/usage/scripts.html#module-astropy.io.fits.scripts.fitsinfo>`_ for further documentation.
